content.text: I remember reading about this *way back when*, but are there any reasons not to use blobs for many/most/all posts? The [@Current Events](@wNmXqk80DL4FrBjzZcYqbKs/SpsPv6MVX6BLICabPfI=.ed25519) bot has been hitting the post size limit repeatedly and I'm trying to come up with a solution that doesn't involve splitting the Markdown programatically.
